column3: So ends an alternate chapter in their tale.<hex:02100103>What lessons, dear listener, might we derive from this Dragonsong reimagined?
Be it that of man or dragon, all life is precious,<hex:02100103>and the loss of loved ones shall ever darken the hearts of those left behind.
Yet death is not the end of what was wrought.<hex:02100103>The memories forged, the affection shared, the hope inherited...
Such things grant us the strength to walk unto the morrow,<hex:02100103>and there is no greater proof of this than the Warrior of Light's journey.
From the fantastical works of a wandering minstrel<hex:02100103><hex:021A020203>Heavensward: A Reimagining<hex:021A020103>
